text: for those of you with the Instant Pot, I made yogurt in it over the weekend and it couldnt have been easier. Beats the heck out of sitting over the stove with a thermometer. <http://www.tidbits-cami.com/2015/09/homemade-yogurt.html>

attachments.title: Homemade Yogurt - Tidbits
attachments.text: Use this method and an electric pressure cooker for the easiest and yummiest way to make homemade yogurt.

text: Anyone watch the new Chefs Table? Crazy!
i haven’t yet - but i can’t wait to watch the one about grant achatz. we ate at Alinea about 18 months ago, and it was a really incredible experience.
really want to go back now that he’s done a conceptual reboot
